headline: GTA Online
subtitle: GTA Online Bonuses this Week: 50% Off All Yachts, Properties and Offices (Sept 9 - 15)
content:
This week, Docktease is offering 50% off all Galaxy Super Yachts and all model upgrades. Yacht Customizations are also at a 25% discount â€“ this includes chrome fittings, color combinations, lighting and more.

Dynasty 8 is offering 50% off all Property purchases as well as 25% off High End Apartment Interiors. Meanwhile Dynasty 8 Executive is also offering steep discounts on commercial property, with 50% off all Offices and 25% discounts on all Office Interiors and Mods.
